features: VERSATILE: Clean where you need - from floors to stairs to couches and more
POWERED BRUSH ROLL: For powerful carpet and hard floor cleaning
REMOVEABLE HAND VACUUM: Clean stairs and other hard-to-reach areas with ease
LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT: Lightweight and compact design for easy storage and use
DIRT CUP: Easy empty dirt cup for simple clean up
body.description: The Dirt Devil Power Express Lite is lightweight, easy to store and is perfect for small spaces. This versatile vacuum is everything you need in one compact design. The stick vacuum is equipped with a powered brush roll that works hard on carpet and hard floors. It also easily converts to a hand vacuum for above floor and stair cleaning. The rinseable filter, easy empty dirt cup and compact design make it easy to use, maintain and store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great light utility and Specialty vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: Dirt Devil Express Light Stick vacuum is a keeper!A great lightweight utility or spot vacuum usage. It can't be beat. Can be used as a hand vacuum or floor vacuum that actually has working rollers. Common Sense design (with excellent functionality) and easy to set up and use.I have a big old school Kirby upright vacuum that is great as my primary vacuum, yet hard to get around nooks and crannies work for simple spot cleaning or cleaning for one or two rooms quickly.Recently my 100% indoor cat somehow got fleas... and I wanted a separate vacuum to do daily vacuuming (+ baking soda) treatments.Although the vet treated the cat successfully, I still needed to SAFELY break the cycle of frea eggs growing to mature adult fleas in the carpets and furniture. Look up flea treatment for carpets on YTube for details.The Dirt Devil was perfect for this. I could easily "clean the dirt out of the after each use". My primary upright (old school Kirby) bag vacuum would have cost me $$$$ in additional replacement bags. Converting to the hand vacuming option easily allowed me to vacuum the upholstery and other chairs that the house.I will update this review in case there's any more to add overall. So far things are great Thanks to the Dirt Devil Power Express.GENERAL (common sense) TIPS:• CLEAN the rollers from time to time, especially in the corners where any vacuum rollers would eventually bind up.• EMPTY & CLEAN it after every use.• I'm not sure of the duty cycle, yet limit your usage to 15 minutes at a time and you won't put a strain on the motor.PROS:• Lightweight & easy to maneuver under furniture.• Great bang for the buck!• Rollers are decent (be sure to clean rollers).• Has a clear top roller base so as to see and monitor the rollers in use.• Quieter than a full-sized vacuum.• Cord length is average (it's quite Ok).• Will stand up in closet, or hang up with attached hanger hook.• Great way to teach children and grandchildren (when old enough) how to clean the house, buy them their own.• Great for older individuals who require a very lightweight utility vacuum for typical cleanups around the house.CONS:None if you use it as a lightweight utility vacuum.PLEASE NOTE:For comparison's sake, it's not a $600+ Dyson vacuum... that actually COSTS OVER 12 times as much as the Dirt Devil Power Express "Lite" stick vacuum.Some reviewers complain about the noise, cord length, roller base does not lock when vacuuming or the rollers stop working (if you don't clean them occasionally). REALLY? Vacuums are not hard to maintain, yet easy to abuse if you neglect them... IMHO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very VERY LIGHT! has POWERED ROLLER and super easy to EMPTY!
reviews.reviewText: THIS IS PERFECT VACUUM FOR:= Prefect for Elderly person who has problem with lifting and pushing heavy vacuums.I got it for my elderly neighbor who is super sweet and kind and she always struggles with her old upward big heavy and noisy vacuum cleaner. She was moved to tears by the gift after she used it for the first time. She said this is exactly what she was looking for and did not k now how to find it.It is very light but it does great job picking up things. It has motorized roller brush so that is the whole difference between the other light small vacuums that are junk because you still have to push them hard to move about. This puppy runs itself and you only control where it goes. Picks up dirt wonderfully.= It is perfect for anyone who is WEAK or ILL or otherwise does not have strength to operate heavy vacuum cleaners.Again, the magic is in the motorized roller that propels this thing so you only help a little to direct where do you want it to go. Also because it is SO SUPER LIGHT, like a feather that you really don't need to strain your heart or muscles or skeletal system to make it go.= It is perfect for young kids some 8 plus who can already help around the house and are ready to move on from a little kids broom to serious tool but are not quite into the management of a big and powerful vacuum cleaner. It is so much fun to work it and see the clean room behind.= It would be prefect for anyone who has a small space and need a quick and easy pick up tool now and then.So here is my bottom line..DEFINITE PROS:- It is feather light- It can do great job on hardwood and carpet- it is easy to clean as all you have to do is open and empty little container, just shake it off into the trash.- it is two in one, just as it is a stick vacuum it is also a hand held vacuum, you just detach the hand and you have a handy small hand held vacuum.- the brush is motorized which is not only easy to maneuver as it propels the vacuum but also does great job picking up stuff from the carpets and hard wood floors and anything in-between.- does great job with pet hair but you will have to clean the roll now and then with scizors to cut out the hair that will roll on it but unless you have bug bucks vaccum every vacuum has the same issue.CONS:- If you consider the job it is meant for then there are no really any cons.- It is NOT designed for big mess or very dirty carpets as it won't penetrate the carpet as deep as the huge vacuum with huge suction power but for normal day to day carpet dirt pickup it is perfect.- it fills out after few days so you need to shake out the little compartment but not a big problem just one click.Overall it is PERFECT light feather vacuum that is ideal for anyone, a handy work horse modern broom really.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slim and effective
reviews.reviewText: This slim and effective vacuum is perfect for hard to reach places, for taking it up and down stairs and for relatively small rooms. I use it as a second vacuum for my finished attic and finished basement, both carpeted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the Dirt Devil vacuum. does a great job in my kitchen. Had one before and loved it, lasted a long time, so I had to buy another one because they are great. S o if you need a good light weight vacuum, which has 2 speeds, one for bare floors and one for carpets, buy this, you won't be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After a group of injuries I just couldn't use our big Shark vacuum. Enter this Dirt Devil and I can vacuum again!Plus:Great suction, has a rug beater (roller), cleans better than I thought it would.Minus:No HEPA filter, cleaning the filter (I don't like touching all the mess), cleaning the roller (most vacuums need this), shorter cord (I use an extension cord), the plastic (mostly the handle) feels cheap.

I bought this to use at in my RV, for the rugs mainly but it is also great for the vinyl floors. Simple to use and the suction is great. I even used it out on my deck rug, with all the leaves and pine needles. The only down fall is you have to clean out the cup after every use as it is small. But still big enough to get the job done. I may even plan on getting one for my house and throw away the broom.
Si tienes tapetes en casa y perritos que sueltan pelito la recomiendo ampliamente. Levanta polvo y pelitos sin problema. Ligera y fácil de guardar.
Just seems a little flimsy but is light and works great 👍

Es una aspiradora, practica y liviana, perfecta para cabellos y pelos de mascotas..pelusa, polvo...no absorve basura grandes por el tipo de compartimento...en muy poco tiempo realizes el aseo en cuardo de piso o loseta. La recomiendo...a penas llevo 1 mes de uso pero para mi es excelente y cumple con lo que solicité. Buen precio.
